titles.title: Honoring the Cultural Initiative, Inc. on the 20th anniversary of the first hip hop conference at Howard University.
Honoring the Cultural Initiative, Inc. on the 20th anniversary of the first hip hop conference at Howard University.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: Honors the Cultural Initiative, Inc. on the 20th anniversary of the first hip hop conference at Howard University in the District of Columbia. (The Cultural Initiative, Inc. is a Howard University student-run corporation established to produce hip hop conferences and related projects.)
